description: Profit margin assumptions for Royal Carriage Limousine service lines. Edit these values based on actual cost data from Moovs and accounting.

airport_transfer.notes: Airport sedan/SUV pickups. Lower margin due to wait time and flight delays.

corporate_hourly.notes: Hourly chauffeur service. Higher margin due to predictable routing.

wedding_event.notes: Wedding and special event transportation. Premium pricing, higher margin.

party_bus.notes: Party bus rentals. Highest margin due to premium pricing and group bookings.

sprinter_van.notes: Sprinter van for groups. Similar to airport but higher capacity.

default_assumptions.notes: Used when Moovs export doesn't provide driver payout or tax data.

ad_spend_allocation.notes: Allocate ad spend to service types proportionally based on keyword intent and conversion attribution.

roas_thresholds.notes: ROAS = Revenue / Ad Spend. Thresholds for labeling keywords/campaigns as SCALE vs FIX.

profit_proxy_formula.notes: Simplified contribution margin. Does not include fixed costs (dispatch, insurance, admin, vehicle payments).

sedan.notes: Baseline margin. Standard black car sedan.

suv.notes: Slightly higher margin due to premium pricing.

party_bus.notes: Highest margin for premium party bus rentals.

seasonal_adjustments.notes: Optional: adjust margins by season (peak wedding season, holiday travel, etc.)

data_quality_requirements.notes: Thresholds for generating reliable reports. If below minimums, flag as 'insufficient data'.

instructions.how_to_update: Edit this file manually with actual cost data from your accounting system or Moovs backend.
instructions.verification: After updating, run 'npm run metrics:import' to regenerate ROI reports with new assumptions.

profit_calculation_example.notes: This is the 'profit proxy' used for prioritizing SEO content and ad campaigns.
